# -------------------------------------------
# Setup
## Load Packages
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(rstan)
library(hBayesDM)
library(bayesplot)
library(here)
library(miscTools)
library(loo)
```



# -------------------------------------------
# IGT
```{r}
joint_orl = readRDS(here("1_IGT_PP", "Data", "2_Fitted", "Joint_ORL",
                         "Joint_ORL_fit.rds"))

joint_orl_noK = readRDS(here("1_IGT_PP", "Data", "2_Fitted", "Joint_ORL_noK",
                             "Joint_ORL_noK_fit.rds"))
```



```{r}
log_lik_orl_joint = extract_log_lik(joint_orl)
log_lik_orl_joint_noK = extract_log_lik(joint_orl_noK)
```



```{r}
loo_orl_joint = loo(log_lik_orl_joint)
loo_orl_joint_noK = loo(log_lik_orl_joint_noK)
```



```{r}
comparison = loo_compare(list("Joint ORL" = loo_orl_joint,
                              "Joint ORL no K" = loo_orl_joint_noK))

print(comparison, simplify = F)
```
